attributes.action: If England Win Euros 2020 the 12th of July is a bank holiday!
attributes.additional_details: I think this is a great opportunity for England football team to win something for the first time since 1966! So as you can imagine lot of people are extremely excited for this to happen! Also if England do win this the amount of sales within in pubs will rocket, which will help from the downfall they have had in the current pandemic.
attributes.background: With England hitting the first semi final in the Euros in 25 years we are all now backing the nation to go on and win it. However with the final being on a Sunday we don’t want celebration to be cut short due to the majority of the nation having work the next day.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
